definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drain, drain out (NH id. press, or drain out; Aram. ms.o0, [[מְחָא]] id.; Ar. ms.w II. drain to the last drop (Dozy); cf. [[מָחַץ]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[מָחִית]] Is 51:17, [[וּמָחִית]] consec. Ez Eze 23:34 Impf. 3 ms. apoc. [[וַיִמֶץ]] Ju Jdg 6:38, 3 mpl [[יִמְחוּ]] Ps 75:9; —drain, drain out, [[וַיִמֶץ טַל מִן־הַנִּזׇּה]] Ju Jdg 6:38 and drained dew out of the fleece; so fig., obj. [[קֻבַּעת]] bowl, goblet, of bewilderment fr. ´[[י]], Is 51:17 ( + [[שׁתה]]; of personif. Jerusalem), cf., obj. [[בּוֹפ]], Ez Eze 23:24 (+ [[שׁתה]]); obj. [[שְׁמָרֶיהָ]] the dregs of it (viz. [[בּוֹמ]]) Ps 75:9 (subj. the wicked).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנִמְחָה]] consec. Le 1:15 and the blood (of the bird) shall be drained out; so Impf. [[יִמָּחֵה]] Le 5:9 (both

definitions.title: P
definitions.body: ); [[מֵי מָלֵא יִמָּחוּ לָמוֹ]] Ps 73:10 water of abundance is drained (i.e. drunk) by them (Gr Che Buhl rd. [[יִמְחוּ]] or [[יׇמׂחוּ]] ([[מחץ]]) they drain).
